name: Human Fall Dreamscape Escapade
description:
Use the tools and simple laws of physics to excel here, enjoy wonderful environment of dreamscapes and utilize our endless imagination to come up with ingenious solutions. Try escaping out of the door using the equipment you have, slide the crates, climb them to reach imaginary solutions supported by the simple and original laws of physics. These obstacles and hinderances are for you to use and play with!

Download now and choose between three wonderful characters of:
Astronaut
Rambo
Skeleton

Spread the wings of your imagination and dream on in this limitless game!
